attributes.action: Statutory requirement for increased public safety at outdoor events
attributes.additional_details:
In light of recent events, ultimately resulting in the loss of a life at what was intended to be a party, we call upon the Office of the Attorney General to introduce a statutory requirement for an increased level of security at Publicly attended, outdoor events.
Failure to ensure safety at these events should be made a criminal offence and where criminal proceedings cannot be held against perpetrators, organisers should be held accountable.
Please show your support for public safety and prove that it is taken seriously in the cabinet.
